definition: cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: I can understand if you want a little bit of something.
sentences.chinese: 我理解你需要的只是續杯或者加量。

sentences.english: Most restaurants serve tea or coffee with free refill.
sentences.chinese: 大多數餐館所供應的茶或咖啡可以免費續杯。

sentences.english: Free coffee refills will give you the chance to fully enjoy yourself and chat to your heart\'s content.
sentences.chinese: 免費的咖啡續杯讓您能盡享個人空間或盡情暢談。

sentences.english: Single drink, enjoy half-price for concession cup.
sentences.chinese: 單杯飲料或酒水，續杯享受半價優惠。

sentences.english: Top up with soda water. Decorate with a mint sprig.
sentences.chinese: 最後用蘇打水續杯並且用薄荷葉裝飾。

sentences.english: Do you want your coffee refilled?

definition: imagawayaki (sweet snack made of batter cooked in the shape of a car wheel, stuffed with azuki bean paste or other fillings)
Nestlé Milo milk drink (popular in Hong Kong)
buy one, get one free/two for the price of one
